channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken fence, 7th July
item.description:
This fence is being broken for quite while now. I am reporting it for the second time. this needs to be addressed as soon as possible to avoid safety issues.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cassland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big and dangerous potholes on the road, 7th July
item.description:
There are several little and large potholes on the Pickford road. A few of them are overly large, posing a risk to drivers, cyclists, and pedestrians at night, particularly during rain. Also, the entire road is not level, so even after 30 minutes of rain, there will be water blockages here and there, making it more dangerous to drive or walk about.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Graffiti on under bridge and surrounding area, 7th July
item.description:
How often is this area patrolled? Open drug taking by large groups in broad day light. plus lots of graffiti and littering. sort it out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willowbrook Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grays Inn Buildings Gate, 7th July
item.description:
The main front gate consistently slams shut each time it is opened. The gate's significant weight produces a loud noise upon closure, which may eventually result in damage to the building if not addressed. Riverside Housing Association has neglected to respond to complaints regarding this issue, and it is negatively affecting all businesses and residents on the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosebery Avenue, Holborn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water ingress due to heavy rain from street, 7th July
item.description:
Water ingress coming from the pavement, leaking into Basement areas when there is heavy rainfall, needs a full investigation. Already contacted Thames Water who have tested and confirmed it is surface water. This leak is a recurring issue for years, and no-one has ever got to the bottom of it. Would really appreciate some urgent assistance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 123, Victoria Street, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bags and more flytipped on Elcot Avenue grass, 7th July
item.description:
The issue of flytipping in this area has gotten out of hand. It's now encouraging systematic anti-solical behaviour including drug taking and graffiti. Something must be done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Friary Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Loaf cafe, 7th July
item.description:
Erith has completed the construction activities and has removed all cones and signage from Clerkenwell Road. However, they have left cones in place, unnecessarily restricting the road to a single lane, and have left signs indicating diversions and ongoing construction. Erith or Camden Council are required to remove these now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosebery Avenue, Holborn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
